meta_title: Groww Value Fund Direct Growth - Groww
meta_desc: Groww Value Fund Direct Growth is Value Oriented Equity mutual fund with risk-reward rating of null/10. It has track record of 9 years, with three year return of 18.38. Risk is Very High
exit_load: Exit load of 1% if redeemed within 1 year.
description: The Scheme seeks to generate returns through a combination of dividend income and capital appreciation by investing primarily in well-diversified portflio of value stocks.

analysis.analysis_desc: Consistently lower annualised returns than category average for the past 1Y, 3Y and 5Y

amc_info.name: Groww Mutual Fund
amc_info.address: Floor 12 A, Tower 2 A, One World Centre, Jupiter Mills Compound  Senapati Bapat Marg,  Mumbai 400013
amc_info.description: Indiabulls Mutual Fund started their mutual fund on 24/03/2011 and its managing total assets of Rs. 10,577 Cr. Its ranked at 24 as per total assets at end of 30th Sep 2017.
amc_info.more_description:
Indiabulls Mutual Fund believes in creating value for customers by striking a balance between liquidity, good returns and keeping investor funds safe and transparent.

The fund house was established on March 24th, 2011 and has a current asset under management of Rs.7992.42 crore. (As of June 2018). Indiabulls Trustee Company Ltd.acts as the trustee company to the asset management company.

The mutual fund offers various schemes in different categories and aims to follow a risk- reward paradigm. With a wide array of mutual across various market categorization, it has targeted investors of different needs and financial goals. Indiabulls Mutual Fund believes in four core values, which are, customer comes first, transparency, integrity and professionalism.

It is located in 110 towns and has 220 established branches across the country.

category_info.category_helper_text: Invests in stocks as per Contrarian investment strategy
category_info.tax_impact: If you redeem within one year, returns are taxed at 20%. If you redeem after one year, returns exceeding Rs 1.25 lakh in a financial year are taxed at 12.5%.
category_info.description: Contra funds follow Contrarian strategy which means investing in stocks in contrast to the prevailing sentiment. Minimum investment in equity is 65%.
